sentences.sentence: But his new job will be hellishly hard.
sentences.translation: 但是要做好这份新工作是相当艰难的。

sentences.sentence: While most of the exoplanets found so far are hellishly hot, OGLE-2005-BLG-390L b has the distinction of being the coldest exoplanet yet discovered.
sentences.translation: 到目前为止，绝大多数发现的外部行星都是可怕的炎热，OGLE-2005-BLG-390L b却很特别，它是至今发现的最冷的外部行星。

sentences.sentence: Scientists have found many planets like HD 209458 b – huge gas giants that orbit hazardously close to their stars and have hellishly hot, poisonous atmospheres.
sentences.translation: 科学家们已经发现了许多类似HD209458b的行星- 拥有庞大的大气层，却离它们的恒星很近的运行，可怕的炎热，剧毒的大气。
